lead_paragraph: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un hinted Sunday that Pyongyang may ring in the new year with another bang — the test-launch of an intercontinental ballistic missile.
snippet: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un hinted Sunday that Pyongyang may ring in the new year with another bang — the test-launch of an intercontinental ballistic missile....

headline.main: N. Korea's Leader Hints of Long-Range Missile Test Launch
headline.print_headline: N. Korea's Leader Hints of Long-Range Missile Test Launch
